div.div: Changes in annual dengue incidence under climate change.
div.p: The figure shows the GAM-estimated 1970â€“1999 average annual dengue incidence (cases/100,000 people) across Mexico for the baseline scenario (top), and the estimated difference in mean annual dengue incidence relative to that baseline (cases/100,000 people) by 2030, 2050, and 2080 under the A1B, A2, and B1 climate change scenarios.
